ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I went into the Mines of Nurga last night.  Found no oven or other combining device like pottery wheels or kilns.  It could be that the necessary items to
ygData.messageBody:
Well I went into the Mines of Nurga last night. Found no oven or other
combining device like pottery wheels or kilns. It could be that the
necessary items to forage for the cake are only available in that zone, or
perhaps in the Temple of Droga. I did not search the Temple of Droga for an
oven though. I'll try and remember to do that tonight.

Sineras, you say that you fear that you may have said too much which implies
that you know more. What might you know that you're not telling us, pray
tell? :)

[51 Minstrel] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work


> This is all what I figured about the quest when i first
> heard about it. So
> far as I gathered, there is no recipe. We apparently have to find one or
> rather forage one where burynai live. Well... technically 'we'
> can't forage
> one.
> And the helm is supposedly from Sebilis.
>
> But I fear I've said too much now... :)
> Good Journey
>
> Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)
